text: Angéline Nadié (1 January 1968 – 17 July 2021) was an Ivorian actress. She is best known for her role as the evil mother of Michel Bohiri's character in Ma Famille. ==Filmography== *Ma Famille (2002–2007) *Marié du net 1 (2005) *Marié du net 2 (2005) *Les Oiseaux du ciel (2006) ==References== Category:1968 births Category:2021 deaths Category:African actors Category:Ivorian people
title: Angelina Nadie
